<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
tab-stops:-1.0in'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p>=
</span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
mso-list:l17 level1 lfo19;tab-stops:-1.0in list .25in'><![if !supportLists]=
><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;
mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span
style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"=
'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Redevelopm=
ent
of the Cetrangolo parcel, which is well situated to serve as a cornerstone =
for
downtown development efforts.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span=
>While
several possible uses for this parcel exist, downtown lodging facilities ha=
ve been
identified as priority by some local officials and business leaders.<o:p></=
o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
tab-stops:-1.0in'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p>=
</span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
mso-list:l17 level1 lfo19;tab-stops:-1.0in list .25in'><![if !supportLists]=
><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;
mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-f=
ont-weight:
bold;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The adapti=
ve
reuse of the Gray Building (former school) for community services (e.g., el=
der
and child care, social service outreach programs).<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In 2002, the community received a =
community
development grant to study the feasibility of rehabilitating the building f=
or
various uses<span style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:bold;mso-bidi-font-style:it=
alic'>.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span></span>The results of this study w=
ere
compiled in a Feasibility Assessment report dated February 2003.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In July 2003, it was purchased by =
the
Gray Building Coalition organization.<span style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:bo=
ld;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
tab-stops:-1.0in'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p>=
</span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
mso-list:l17 level1 lfo19;tab-stops:-1.0in list .25in'><![if !supportLists]=
><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;
mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span
style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"=
'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Greater
viability of downtown retail establishments and related commercial services
(e.g., restaurants, personal services) through a variety of parking, lighti=
ng,
and streetscape improvements.<span style=3D'mso-no-proof:yes'> </span><o:p>=
</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
tab-stops:-1.0in'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p>=
</span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.25in;
mso-list:l17 level1 lfo19;tab-stops:-1.0in list .25in'><![if !supportLists]=
><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;
mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span
style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"=
'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Improvemen=
t of
the streetscape to maintain and enhance South and North Main Streets and the
area around the Common.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Putting together a comprehensive package of improvements=
 as
called for in the downtown plan is an obvious challenge to the community.<s=
pan
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Fortunately, the Vermont downtown
program makes available a variety of financial and technical resources to
communities that plan for the revitalization of downtowns, villages, and
community centers.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'>=
<span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Since the
downtown program was launched, several of Vermont&#8217;s largest cities ha=
ve
secured downtown designation.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span=
>The
goals and benefits of the downtown program are not limited to cities, howev=
er,
and many smaller village centers are also eligible.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Designating a portion of Northfield
Village as a downtown district would provide greater access to funding for a
variety of infrastructure and capital improvement projects, and would allow=
 for
the town to recapture some tax revenues that would otherwise go to the stat=
e.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Norwich University</span></u></b><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-=
bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Norwich University serves as an important economic engin=
e within
the community. Not only is the University the town&#8217;s largest employer,
but also the student population accounts for approximately 25% of the
town&#8217;s residents.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p>=
</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Employment levels are projected to stay roughly constant,
with between 480 and 500 employees. As stated in Chapter 4, university
officials have projected an increasing enrollment.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Strengthening physical connections=
 to
the college with the development of a path along the Dog River should serve=
 to enhance
the vitality of downtown businesses. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>With recent on-campus construction, including the Kreitz=
berg
Arena and the National Guard Armory, it is likely that the University will
attract an increasing number of short-term, non-student visitors.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Added traffic &#8211; including
short-term visitors and larger student populations &#8211; should also supp=
ort
local retail businesses and related amenities, such as restaurants and lodg=
ing
facilities. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Other physical improvements may occur as a result of the
strategic planning process currently underway.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Local officials have been involved=
 in
that process, and have maintained open communication with University offici=
als
on a variety of issues of mutual concern.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&=
nbsp;
</span>Efforts to include the university in future discussions regarding
community and economic development would not only ensure open communication,
but also would take advantage of the human resources that the University ha=
s to
offer the community.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Finally, the presence of Norwich University, and its
well-educated workforce, creates additional opportunities for economic
development beyond providing educational services.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Opportunities for collaboration be=
tween
businesses, the municipality, and the university may strengthen local
entrepreneurial efforts.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Alum=
ni who
remain committed to the University &#8211; and the community &#8211; may al=
so
be a resource that could benefit development efforts in Northfield. <o:p></=
o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h5 style=3D'text-align:justify'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bi=
di-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-style:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Industrial
&amp; Commercial Development <o:p></o:p></span></u></h5>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3D1Paragraph style=3D'margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:0in;
tab-stops:.5in 1.0in'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10=
.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Physical reminder=
s of
Northfield&#8217;s industrial history are plentiful.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The former Cabot facility, several
buildings within the Northfield Business Park (railroad property) and the
Nantanna Mill have been used and reused for a variety of industrial and
commercial activities.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In add=
ition,
the Bean Industrial Park &#8211; established in 1995 &#8211; includes eight
building lots served by municipal water and sewer.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Additional land adjacent to the pa=
rk is
available for expansion.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Anch=
oring
the park on the only developed lot is the 53,000 square feet Cabot Hosiery =
facility,
which was relocated from its former Main Street location with the assistanc=
e of
a community development grant from the state.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The former Cabot facility has rece=
ntly
been renovated for retail use.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3D1Paragraph style=3D'margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bo=
ttom:
0in;margin-left:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0i=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The Bean Industrial Park, Nantanna Mill, and Northfield
Business Park all offer a variety of facilities for the location and/or
expansion of many types and sizes of industries and businesses.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Presently, these areas are include=
d in
the regional database of available commercial and manufacturing space, and =
are
marketed by the Central Vermont Economic Development Corporation.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The community has designated these=
 areas
as industrial sites within local zoning bylaws, which allow a wide range of
commercial and industrial uses.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </sp=
an>In
addition, all of these facilities are presently served by municipal water,
sewer, and three-phase power, and have good access to Route 12&#8211; the
principal arterial serving the community.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3D1Paragraph style=3D'margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bo=
ttom:
0in;margin-left:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0i=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>In addition to the sites in and around the Village, the =
town
has designated land in the vicinity of the Route 12/Route 64 intersection a=
s an
industrial district under current zoning.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&=
nbsp;
</span>The intent of this designation was to take advantage of the area&#82=
17;s
convenient access to I-89 (via Route 64).<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&=
nbsp;
</span>Steep terrain, the lack of municipal water and sewer, and the
predominance of single-family homes in the vicinity may, however, undermine=
 the
potential transportation advantages.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p><span
 style=3D'text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<h5 style=3D'text-align:justify'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bi=
di-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-style:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Infrastruct=
ure
Improvements<o:p></o:p></span></u></h5>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Issues associated with community facilities and services=
 are
addressed in detail in Chapter 7, and transportation is addressed in Chapte=
r 6.
The local economic climate is, however, partly dependent upon the availabil=
ity
of infrastructure, including transportation facilities.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>It is critical that planning for
community facilities, transportation and land use be integrated with the
community&#8217;s economic development goals.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Several infrastructure needs associated with the downtown
were described above.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Example=
s of
other key considerations in Northfield, which are addressed elsewhere in th=
is
plan, include improvements to Route 12 north of the Village to provide a sa=
fer,
more efficient highway access to the Barre-Montpelier area; protection of t=
he
municipal water supply from potential contamination; and. upgrade of the
wastewater treatment facility.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Finally, it should be noted that business decisions
regarding location or expansion are made by entrepreneurs who may be influe=
nced
as much by the amenities, or quality of life, offered by a particular
community.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Maintaining
Northfield&#8217;s unique character, ensuring that the community is a pleas=
ant
place to live, work and go to school may be the most important economic
development policy the community can pursue. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:14=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>5.4<span
style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Economic Developm=
ent
Goals, Policies &amp; Tasks<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:=
Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Goal</span></i></b><b style=3D'mso-=
bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Ro=
man"'><span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b><=
/p>

<div style=3D'mso-element:para-border-div;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText3 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-si=
ze:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>A
strong local economy characterized by well paying jobs for area residents, a
vibrant downtown, business opportunities for local entrepreneurs, and a bro=
ad
tax base.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<b style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:no=
rmal'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;layout-grid-mode:l=
ine'><br
clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span></i></b>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Policies=
</span></i></b><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'> <o:p></=
o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyTextIndent style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-list:l55 level=
1 lfo20;
tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial'>=
<span
style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&n=
bsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Encourage
strongly the expansion of existing businesses, and establishment of new
businesses that pay a livable wage and reinforce the community&#8217;s hist=
oric
settlement pattern are strongly encouraged.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyTextIndent style=3D'margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;
text-indent:0in;tab-stops:.5in'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fo=
nt-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp=
;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyTextIndent style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justif=
y;
mso-list:l55 level1 lfo20;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Expand
municipal efforts to plan for and promote economic and community developmen=
t,
including efforts to:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l16 level1 =
lfo21;
tab-stops:-1.0in 0in list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-s=
ize:
9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Improve the
local economic climate and quality of life;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;

Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>5)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Convene a
meeting of regional development officials to consider how their services ca=
n be
better focused on Northfield to expand local utilization of available progr=
ams
and services. [Planning Commission, Staff]<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DLevel1 style=3D'margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0=
in;
mso-pagination:widow-orphan;mso-list:none;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DLevel1 style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-list:l2 level1 lfo22;tab-stops:-1.0in list .25in left 1.0in 6.5in'><![i=
f !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>6)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Maintain
regular communication with officials at Norwich University to ensure the
successful establishment of the Center for the Study of Cyber-Terrorism and
Cyber-Crime, and to take full advantage of that center through an upgrade to
the communities telecommunications infrastructure and the revitalization of=
 the
downtown through targeted infrastructure improvements [Selectmen, Trustees,
Planning Commission, Staff]<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal align=3Dcenter style=3D'text-align:center'><b style=3D=
'mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";text-transform:uppercase'>Chap=
ter
6.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Transportation</span></b><=
span
style=3D'font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";text-transform:uppercase'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-=
font-weight:
bold;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-=
font-weight:
bold;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>6.1<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Overview<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Northfield&#8217;s
historic development has been shaped by transportation, especially the rail=
road
in the 19<sup>th</sup> century followed by the automobile in the 20<sup>th<=
/sup>.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The location, condition, and capac=
ity of
the regional transportation network and transportation facilities and servi=
ces
continue to influence Northfield&#8217;s land use patterns, economic
development, and the use of resources.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbs=
p;
</span>This chapter provides an overview of how the existing transportation
network functions and how it might be improved.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:14=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>6.2<span
style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Travel Patterns<o=
:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>As
is the case throughout Vermont, the private automobile is the dominant mode=
 of
transportation in Northfield.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>According to the 2000 Census, 68.6% of Northfield&#8217;s labor force
commuted to work in a single occupancy vehicle (i.e., they drove alone).<sp=
an
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>A relatively high percentage (14.7=
%)
walked to work, while 12.3% carpooled.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbs=
p;
</span>Less than 1% bicycled on a regular basis, and 3.0% worked at home.<s=
pan
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The average commute in 2000 was 21=
.1 minutes
(up from 18.9 minutes in 1990).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText2 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-si=
ze:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>As mentioned in Chapter 6, nearly half of Northf=
ield&#8217;s
labor force worked in town in 1990 (the last year for which data is availab=
le),
while the majority of those commuting out of town headed to Montpelier, Bar=
re
City or Town, or to Berlin.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>G=
iven
this reliance on the automobile, the location and condition of the town&#82=
17;s
highway network is of primary concern when considering Northfield&#8217;s
transportation network.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>6.3<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Roads
&amp; Highways</span></i></b><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Northfield has over 93 miles of public highways, includi=
ng
over 82 miles of municipal roads.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </=
span>A
breakdown of roads, by classification, function, and location, is presented=
 in
Table 6.1.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

      <p class=3DMsoNormal><span style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-siz=

      font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Collector<o=

      </td>
      <td width=3D66 valign=3Dtop style=3D'width:49.5pt;border-top:none;bor=

      none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:solid black 1.0pt;
      mso-border-top-alt:solid black .75pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid black =
.75pt;
      mso-border-alt:solid black .75pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1=
.0pt'>
      <p class=3DMsoNormal align=3Dright style=3D'text-align:right'><span
      style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
      mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
      </td>
     </tr>
     <tr style=3D'mso-yfti-irow:6;height:9.75pt'>
      <td width=3D148 valign=3Dtop style=3D'width:110.7pt;border:solid blac=

      border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .75pt;mso-border-alt:s=
olid black .75pt;
      padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:9.75pt'>
      <p class=3DMsoNormal><span style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-siz=
e:10.0pt;
      font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Class 2
      (outside Village)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
      </td>
      <td width=3D120 valign=3Dtop style=3D'width:1.25in;border-top:none;bo=
rder-left:

      </td>
     </tr>

src=3D"TownPlan_files/image026.gif" align=3Dleft hspace=3D10 vspace=3D10
alt=3D"Text Box: Table 6.1&#13;&#10;Mileage Summary of &#13;&#10;State &amp=
; Local Roads&#13;&#10;Classification	Function	Mileage&#13;&#10;State Highw=
ay	Arterial	11.1&#13;&#10;Class 1 (Village)	Arterial/Collector	1.2&#13;&#10=
;Class 1 (outside Village)	Arterial	0.9&#13;&#10;Class 2 (Village)	Collecto=
r	0&#13;&#10;Class 2 (outside Village)	Collector	4.8&#13;&#10;Class 3 (Vill=
age)	Local Access	9.5&#13;&#10;Class 3 (outside Village)	Local Access	57.47=
&#13;&#10;Class 4	Access/Recreation	8.34&#13;&#10;	TOTAL	93.7&#13;&#13;&#10=
;&#13;&#10;"
v:shapes=3D"_x0000_s2065"><![endif]><u><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-=
bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>State Highways<o:p></o:p></span></u></h1>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The principal arterial highway serving Northfield is Rou=
te
12, which follows the Dog River and connects the community with Berlin, Mon=
tpelier,
and several important transportation corridors to the north, and Randolph to
the south.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Route 12A diverges=
 from
Route 12 just south of Northfield Village and provides access to Roxbury be=
fore
rejoining Route 12 at Randolph.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>These highways run parallel to one another until they re-converge in
Randolph.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Route 12A provides =
access
to the neighboring Town of Roxbury.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Traffic volumes on <b style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:norm=
al'>Route
12</b> are heaviest in the Village, especially in the vicinity of Depot Squ=
are.
The highest volumes outside of the Village are along the segment of highway
between its intersection with Route 12A and Route 64 &#8211; which provides
access to Interstate 89 &#8211; and north of the village into Berlin.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Traffic south of the Route 64
intersection is relatively low (see Figure 6.1).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id=3D"_x0000_s2067" type=3D"#_x0000_t75" style=3D'position:absolute;left:0;
 text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:290.35pt;height:168.25pt;
 z-index:18;mso-wrap-distance-top:7.2pt;mso-wrap-distance-bottom:7.2pt;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' o:allowincell=3D"f" stroked=3D"t" strokeweig=
ht=3D"1.25pt">
 <v:imagedata src=3D"TownPlan_files/image027.wmz" o:title=3D""/>
 <w:wrap type=3D"square" side=3D"largest"/>
</v:shape><![if gte mso 9]><o:OLEObject Type=3D"Embed" ProgID=3D"Excel.Shee=
t.8"
 ShapeID=3D"_x0000_s2067" DrawAspect=3D"Content" ObjectID=3D"_1197873292">
</o:OLEObject>
<![endif]><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=3D391 height=3D228
src=3D"TownPlan_files/image028.gif" align=3Dleft hspace=3D12 vspace=3D10 v:=
shapes=3D"_x0000_s2067"><![endif]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Traffic on Route 12 to the north of the Village has decl=
ined
in recent years, with the Average Annual Daily Trips (AADT) between Depot
Square and Cox Brook Road declining from 5,600 trips in 1986 to 5,400 trips=
 in
2000, a reduction of 3.6%.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>No=
rth of
Cox Brook Road, the AADT declined from 4,950 trips to 3,900 trips in 2000, a
reduction of over 21%.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Volumes
south of the Village, however, have increased over the same period.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Most significant has been the incr=
ease
in traffic volumes along the segment of Route 12 from its junction with Rou=
te
12A to the intersection with Route 64, which has increased 21.2% from 3,640
trips in 1986 to 4,400 trips in 2000, indicating that a growing number of
motorists are opting to use I-89, rather than Route 12, for out-of-town tra=
vel.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Although Interstate 89 brushes Northfield, Exit 5 is loc=
ated
just east of the town boundary in Williamstown.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This important highway is accessed=
 via <b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Route 64</b>, a limited access highway
constructed as part of the interstate highway system.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Route 64 intersects with Route 12
approximately 2.7 miles west of Exit 5.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nb=
sp;
</span>Traffic on Route 64 has increased steadily in the past 15 years.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>According to VTrans, traffic along=
 the
portion of highway between Route 12 and the Williamstown town line increased
from 1,630 trips in 1986 to an estimated 4,500 trips in 2000 &#8211; an
increase of 176%.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Traffic on <b style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Rout=
e 12A</b>
has also increased, with traffic volumes in 2000 estimated to have reached
2,100 trips between Lovers Lane and Stony Brook Road (TH-8), and 1,800 trips
between Stony Brook<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>and Felch=
in
Road (TH-6). These changes, along with increased traffic volumes on Route 6=
4,
indicate the growing importance of Route 12A and Lovers Lane as key connect=
ions
to I-89 from Northfield and surrounding communities.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Each of the three state highways is in relatively good
condition and no major construction projects or highway upgrades are presen=
tly
included on the state or regional transportation improvement programs.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The condition of Route 12 north of=
 the
Village, however, does raise concerns regarding traffic safety, access and
potential disincentives for future economic development in the community.<s=
pan
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The portion of the road in the vic=
inity
of Northfield Falls is characterized by:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoFooter style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:.5in center 3.0i=
n right 6.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:.25in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l13 level1=
 lfo23;
tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Win=
gdings;
mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Narrow
shoulders and inadequate bicycle lanes<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:.25in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l13 level1=
 lfo23;
tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Win=
gdings;
mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Several sh=
arp
curves<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:.25in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l13 level1=
 lfo23;
tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Win=
gdings;
mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Numerous
locations with restricted sight distance, and<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:.25in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l13 level1=
 lfo23;
tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Win=
gdings;
mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&sect;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Ledge
outcroppings within the highway right-of-way which inhibit sight distances =
and
pose a risk to motorists, prevent the installation of bicycle lanes and make
snow removal difficult which exacerbates potential safety hazards<o:p></o:p=
></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>The
town would like to work with VTrans to develop a plan to upgrade this secti=
on
of highway, including some widening and/or straightening of travel lanes and
shoulders, ledge removal and the installation of traffic calming to mitigate
potential adverse impacts of such an upgrade.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h2 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-f=
ont-size:
10.0pt'>Municipal Roads <o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Northfield maintains
approximately 82 miles of local roads.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbs=
p;
</span>These include heavily used regional collectors, quiet streets servin=
g village
neighborhoods, lightly used rural roads providing access to a few homes, an=
d a
few roads not maintained for year-round traffic.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The road network includes 47 bridg=
es
(five in the Village), including six covered bridges addressed separately
below.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>In Vermont, municipal roads a=
re
designated as Class 1, 2, 3, 4, or trail.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&=
nbsp;
</span>Class 1 roads include all state highways under the jurisdiction of
municipalities &#8211; typically state routes through village centers. Clas=
s 2
and 3 roads are defined for the purposes of state aid and must be negotiabl=
e,
under normal conditions, year-round by a standard passenger car.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The state determines which town ro=
ads
are Class 2, which typically provide access to neighboring towns.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Class 4 roads are not generally
maintained on a year-round basis.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Class 3 and 4 roads are designated by the local Selectboard.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Roads are shown by classification =
and
surface type on the Transportation Map.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nb=
sp;
</span>Currently, 12 miles of town road outside of the Village are paved, a=
nd
all but one mile of road in the Village is paved.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Until 1997, VTrans applied the
national American Association of Surface and Highway Transportation
Organizations (AASHTO) highway design standards to roads in the state.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In response to growing concern tha=
t AASHTO
standards were inappropriate for Vermont&#8217;s small villages and rural
settings, the state prepared and adopted <i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:no=
rmal'>Vermont
State Standards for the Design of Transportation Construction, Reconstructi=
on
and Rehabilitation of Freeways, Roads &amp; Streets</i>.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>These include standards for roads
serving urban, village, and rural contexts that are designed specifically f=
or
Vermont.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>These standards shou=
ld be
applied to future upgrade and construction of state, town, and private road=
s in
Northfield.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Although Northfield&#8217;s r=
oads
are generally in good shape and adequate to accommodate current traffic
volumes, several improvement projects are planned to address existing
deficiencies. Projects listed in Table 6.2 are included on VTrans
&#8220;Transportation Improvements Projects&#8221; (TIP) list and are in so=
me
stage of project design and</span><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-=
font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'> </span><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>scheduling.=
</span><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span></span><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Other proje=
cts
identified by the municipality but not included on the TIP are also shown.<=
span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For the most part, identified
improvement projects include the rehabilitation or replacement of bridges.<=
span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>These improvements are part of an
aggressive effort on the part of the town over the past several years to
upgrade several deficient bridges.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>It is anticipated that these projects are eligible for the states to=
wn
highway bridge program, which provides 90% state funding.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The town has allocated money in re=
serve
funds on an annual basis to fund bridge improvements.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<b><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Ar=
ial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'=
><br
clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span></b>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:s=

      mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Replace bridge over Cox Brook=

      </td>
      <td width=3D96 valign=3Dtop style=3D'width:1.0in;border-top:none;bord=
er-left:
      none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:solid black 1.0pt;
      mso-border-top-alt:solid black .75pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid black =

      mso-border-alt:solid black .75pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
      <p class=3DMsoNormal align=3Dcenter style=3D'text-align:center'><span

alt=3D"Text Box: Table 6.2&#13;&#10;Summary of Road &amp; Highway Improveme=
nt Projects&#13;&#10;Projects on VTrans TIP	Description	Schedule	% State Fu=
nding&#13;&#10;Bridge #46/TH29 	Replace bridge over Union Brook	Completed	9=
0%&#13;&#10;Bridge #54/TH12	Replace bridge over Cox Brook	Completed	90%&#13=
;&#10;Bridge #50/TH25	Reconstruct bridge over Stony Brook	Unscheduled	90%&#=
