&#13;&#10;Projects identified by municipality	Description	Schedule	&#13;&#1=
0;Lovers Lane upgrade	Upgrade to accommodate Rt. 64 &#8211; Rt. 12A cut-off=
	Unscheduled	State share&#13;&#10;Main Street bridge	Reconstruct bridge ove=
r Dog River	Unscheduled	State share&#13;&#10;Route 12/Northfield Falls	Ledg=
e Removal/install bike lanes	Unscheduled	State project&#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;"
v:shapes=3D"_x0000_s2066"><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bid=
i-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Other projects, including the proposed le=
dge
removal on Route 12 north and the need to upgrade Lovers Lane to accommodate
increasing through traffic using this road as a short cut from I-89 to Route
12A south to the Roxbury Mountain Road, would need to be undertaken by VTra=
ns
under a different funding program.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Both of these projects should, however, be supported, and funded by
VTrans because they are either part of, or directly serve, the state highway
system.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The Lovers Lane proje=
ct is
especially critical to the community, given its use as a regional collector=
.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>In addition to existing
deficiencies, it is important that the municipality monitor development to
ensure that the local road network is not overburdened by anticipated growt=
h in
the community.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>An effort to m=
onitor
traffic and road conditions on an ongoing basis, and standards to identify =
and
mitigate the impacts of new development on the road network, can avoid futu=
re
problems.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><u><span style=3D'font-=
size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weig=
ht:
bold'>Covered Bridges <o:p></o:p></span></u></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in 0in=
 .5in 1.0in 1.5in 2.0in 2.5in 3.0in 3.5in 4.0in 4.5in 5.0in 5.5in 6.0in 6.5=
in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The five covered bridges currently in use in Northfield
deserve special note.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Three of
these bridges are located along a half-mile segment of Cox Brook Road &#821=
1;
the highest concentration of covered bridges along any road in Vermont.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Each of the five bridges continues=
 to
provide the function they were designed for in the 19<sup>th</sup> century,
which not only contributes to the community&#8217;s character but also
represents a wise financial investment.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nb=
sp;
</span>Two of the bridges recently underwent minor repair, including new ro=
ofs,
and no major upgrades are anticipated in the near future other than routine
maintenance.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>It is important =
that
there be continued protection from damage caused by overweight and/or overs=
ize
vehicles.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>All of Northfield&#=
8217;s
covered bridges are historic structures and are now eligible for federal
funding to cover the cost of future rehabilitation.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b=
><u><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Road Mai=
ntenance<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Maintaining and enhancing the
local road network in a safe and cost effective manner is an important
community responsibility.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The=
 town
highway department is responsible for maintaining both town and village roa=
ds,
the latter of which is funded through an annual contract with the Village.<=
span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The total cost of road maintenance=
 to
the town is second to education in terms of annual expense to the
community.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In 2002, the town
budgeted $783,750 for the highway department, of which approximately 65% was
funded through town property taxes, 17% through a maintenance agreement with
the Village, and 19% through state highway aid and miscellaneous fees and
interest. <i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></i></span></p>

<b><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Ar=
ial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'=
><br
clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span></b>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The highway department is bas=
ed
out of the town garage, located just off Route 12 just north of the
Village.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In addition to the h=
ighway
department, the garage also houses the Ambulance Service and provides stora=
ge
for other municipal departments and social service agencies.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Recent renovations included a roof
replacement, new garage doors, and a new heating system.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>With the exception of the need for=
 some
site work, including resurfacing the parking and work-area around the garag=
e,
the facility is adequate to meet the foreseeable needs of the community.<o:=
p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>An ongoing maintenance issue =
is
the need for a stable and affordable source of gravel to maintain the
town&#8217;s roads (almost all Village roads are paved).<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Fortunately, there are local vendo=
rs
that have minimized the high cost of hauling that has driven up the cost of
gravel in other communities.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>=
The
long-term availability of gravel, however, is not guaranteed.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The town may want to consider the
acquisition of a gravel source to avoid future gravel shortages and/or seve=
re
price fluctuations.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>To stabilize expenditures from
year to year, the town maintains reserve funds for capital improvements,
including road construction, reconstruction and paving, bridge repair and
replacement, and equipment replacement.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nb=
sp;
</span>In addition to road and bridge projects described above, the current
capital improvement plan anticipates replacing the town&#8217;s 1987 grader=
 in
2004 and the 1994 dump truck in 2004.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>The town also purchased a new loader in 2001.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Highway Access Management<o:p></o:p=
></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>The
frequency, location, and design of highway accesses &#8211; or curb cuts
&#8211; have a direct bearing on the safety and efficiency of both town roa=
ds
and state highways.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The desig=
n of
curb cuts also is important with regard to stormwater management and road
maintenance.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Managing access =
can
improve safety and better maintain highway capacity over time.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Several techniques may be applied
through Northfield&#8217;s zoning regulations, road policies and ordinances,
and additional land use regulations (e.g., subdivision regulations).<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>These include requirements for:<o:=
p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Minimum si=
ght
distance at a driveway or street intersection,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Maximum nu=
mber
of driveways per lot,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Mandatory
shared driveways,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Maximum wi=
dth
of curb-cuts,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Minimum and
maximum driveway lengths,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Minimum or
maximum on-site parking, shared-parking, and parking design,<o:p></o:p></sp=
an></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'margin-bottom:3.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.=
25in;
mso-list:l52 level1 lfo24;tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot=
;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Minimum ar=
ea
for loading and unloading, and<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3Da style=3D'text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l52 le=
vel1 lfo24;
tab-stops:list .25in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;
mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot;<span
style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Landscaping
and buffers to visually define and enhance access points.<o:p></o:p></span>=
</p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Local development regulations (e.g., zoning, subdivision
regulations) and road ordinances are effective tools to manage access.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Future attention to access managem=
ent,
and the implementation of the strategies listed above, will enable local bo=
ards
to balance the needs of motorists, pedestrians and bicyclists and improve
highway safety and efficiency. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><b><u><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Traffic
Management &amp; Traffic Calming<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>As stated above, state and local roads are generally
adequate to meet current demand.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Over time, however, traffic volumes are likely to increase due to the
cumulative impacts of ongoing, small-scale development.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Efforts to monitor traffic volumes=
 on an
ongoing basis would help the community plan for future capacity
deficiencies.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></sp=
an></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 6.5in=
'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>One category of techniques to maintain relatively slow
traffic speeds in settled areas, enhance pedestrian safety, and improve the
overall environment is often referred to as traffic calming.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Such techniques include narrow veh=
icle
traffic lanes, wide sidewalks, medians, on-street parking, roundabouts, rai=
sed
and/or textured crosswalks, bulb-outs, street-tree plantings, and street
furniture. Traffic calming is especially important along state highways and
town roads in Northfield Village, Northfield Falls and in Northfield Center=
. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 4.5in=
 6.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>6.4<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Parking</span></i></b><i
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bi=
di-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p=
></span></i></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><u><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p><span style=3D'text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span><=
/o:p></span></u></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in'><b><=
u><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Downtown
parking<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 4.5in=
 6.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Public parking in downtown appears adequate to meet curr=
ent
demand.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Better management and=
/or
organization might make more efficient use of available space.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Should current demand increase, ho=
wever,
the Village and local businesses may need to explore options for expanding
parking.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Possible causes of
increased demand may be a more intensive use occupying the old armory build=
ing
or additional in-fill development in the downtown area.<o:p></o:p></span></=
p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The Central Vermont Regional Planning Commission (CVRPC)=
 has
assisted other communities in the region to study parking demand and
availability in villages and downtowns, and may be available to assist
Northfield with the preparation of a downtown-parking plan.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Such a plan should look at existin=
g and
anticipated demand, the current use of available spaces and, if appropriate,
alternatives for creating additional public parking opportunities.<o:p></o:=
p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Outside of the downtown area, land uses that require acc=
ess
by employees, customers, residents, and/or visitors are required to provide
off-street parking adequate to meet anticipated demand.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Current parking requirements shoul=
d be
reviewed to determine whether existing standards are sufficient.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In addition to the number of spaces
required, the location, configuration, and design of parking facilities can
have a significant impact on the community&#8217;s character, as well as on=
 the
safety of motorists and pedestrians.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>As the population ages more handicapped parking should be considered=
.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 4.5in=
 6.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4 style=3D'mso-pagination:none;tab-stops:-1.0in .5in'><span style=3D'font=
-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Res=
idential
Neighborhoods<o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p class=3DMsoNormal><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.=
0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p>=
</span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 4.5in=
 6.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>One issue of special concern is the extent to which the
conversion of single-family homes in historic neighborhoods to multi-family
housing can limit the availability of on-street parking.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The Town and Village presently enf=
orce a
parking ordinance to minimize such impacts, and zoning standards could requ=
ire
that adequate off-street parking is provided for all dwelling units.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The continued update and enforceme=
nt of
these tools should avoid problems for residents and homeowners in Village
neighborhoods.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
color:white;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-lan=
guage:
AR-SA;layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:alw=
ays'>
</span>

<h3 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-f=
ont-size:
10.0pt'>Commuter Parking<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><b><u><s=
pan
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Commuter
Parking<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The only formal commuter parking lot serving local resid=
ents
is located adjacent to Exit 5 of I-89 in Williamstown.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>VTrans is planning to upgrade and =
expand
this facility in the coming years, which should benefit Northfield
commuters.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The town, in conju=
nction
with the Central Vermont Regional Planning Commission, should also explore =
the
feasibility and benefits of establishing a small commuter lot within the
Village to serve commuters headed north on Route 12 or west to the Mad River
Valley.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>6.5<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Pedestrian
&amp; Bicycle Circulation</span></i></b><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:nor=
mal'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in 4.5in=
 6.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in 0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>In Northfield Village, where historic settlement patterns
reflect a pedestrian scale and orientation, an extensive sidewalk network
exists.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The presence of the
existing sidewalk network has a significant impact on traffic volumes, as
indicated by the nearly 15% of local commuters who walk to work &#8211; a r=
ate
that is significantly higher compared to the 5.2% of commuters who walk to =
work
statewide. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>In recent years, many sidewal=
ks
that had fallen into a state of disrepair were upgraded, and some key sidew=
alks
were extended to strengthen pedestrian connections.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Recent improvements include the
extension of sidewalks to the school, which provides better access for
students.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This project was fu=
nded
in part through a VTrans enhancement grant. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The extension of the existing sidewalk system, an/or the
creation of connected walking and bicycling paths outside of the Village, c=
ould
decrease congestion and increase options for local residents, including
children, students, and the elderly.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>A priority connection is a multi-purpose path linking Memorial Park =
with
Northfield Falls Recreation Fields.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Such a path, which would preferably run parallel to Route 12 outside=
 of
the highway right-of-way, would also provide a connection from the Village =
to
the Bean Industrial Park.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Ano=
ther
possible connection would involve the construction of a path adjacent to the
Dog River, providing an additional link from the village to Norwich
University.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This was recommen=
ded in
the downtown study (see Chapter 5.)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>There are no sidewalks outside the village.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Most of Northfield's rural roads, =
both
paved and unpaved, have little or no shoulder.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Because of generally low traffic v=
olumes
and vehicle speeds, however, they are generally safe for walking and
bicycling.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Future increases in
traffic volumes or speeds could result in safety concerns.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>One opportunity to expand walking =
and
cycling opportunities outside of the village includes the expansion of bicy=
cle
lanes, or construction of an off-street bicycle path, along Route 12 and Ro=
ute
12A concurrent with the planned extension of municipal sewer lines.<o:p></o=
:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>6.6<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Transit
&amp; Public Transportation</span></i></b><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:n=
ormal'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b=
><u><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Local Tr=
ansit<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Until recently, local public transit was provided by Cen=
tral
Vermont Wheels<sup>&reg;</sup>, which provided a free, fixed-route service
linking the Norwich University Library with Depot Square and the Senior
Center.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Door to door service =
was
also provided by reservation for a fee within the community.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In 2001, over 6,000 rider/trips to=
ok
advantage of this service.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Management problems at Wheels in 2002/2003, however, led to the
organization&#8217;s filing for bankruptcy and subsequent suspension of
service.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<u><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Ar=
ial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><br clear=3Dall
style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span></u>

<h1 style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in .25in .5in .75in 1.0=
in 1.25in 1.5in 1.75in 2.0in 2.25in 2.5in 2.75in 3.0in 3.25in 3.5in 3.75in =
4.0in 4.25in 4.5in 4.75in 5.0in 5.25in'><u><span
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Regional Transit<o:p></o:p></span></u><=
/h1>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Transit service is presently provided by Chittenden Coun=
ty
Transit Authority (CCTA) under contract with VTrans.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Daily transit services link Northf=
ield
Village and Norwich University with Montpelier.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Service includes two early morning
commuter runs, three mid-day runs, and four afternoon/early evening runs.<s=
pan
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Fixed stops include the Senior Cen=
ter,
Norwich Library, East and Main Street and limited runs to the Bean Industri=
al
Park.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Door to door service is=
 also
available with advance request.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </sp=
an>In
2001, over 4,500 commuter/trips took advantage of these services.<o:p></o:p=
></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>It is not clear whether CCTA will continue to function as
the transit service provider for the community and regions.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The permanent resumption of both l=
ocal
and regional transit service by a stable, well-managed provider is a high
priority for the community, and is a necessity for the relatively large num=
ber
of Northfield residents that lack private transportation options.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b=
><u><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Inter-Re=
gional
Bus Service<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The nearest long distance bus services are provided by
Vermont Transit, which stops in Montpelier and Barre.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Vermont Transit provides bus servi=
ce to
major cities primarily north and south of Northfield along the I-89
corridor.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span><=
/p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Rail Service</span></u></b><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-=
bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The New England Central (formerly &#8220;Central
Vermont&#8221;) Railway, Inc. owns and maintains the railroad network throu=
gh
Northfield.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Historically, the
railroad provided important freight service to Northfield industries, altho=
ugh
such use is presently limited.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </spa=
n>The
availability of freight service, however, has the potential to influence the
location of future industries<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Amtrak presently provides passenger train service.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The <i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-styl=
e:normal'>Vermonter</i>
provides daily service to and from New York and Washington D.C., with trains
departing mid-morning and returning in the evening.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Although the trains travel through
Northfield, the nearest scheduled stops are in Montpelier and Randolph.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Given the high student population =
and
likelihood that transient visitors to Northfield will increase in the coming
years, Amtrak should include scheduled service to the Village.<o:p></o:p></=
span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Air Transport</span></u></b><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-=
bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'><s=
pan
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The Burlington International
Airport (BIA), located in South Burlington, provides regional and internati=
onal
airline service.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>BIA has expa=
nded
both facilities and service in recent years.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Manchester, N.H., airport also pro=
vides
regional and international flights.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Due to service from discount airlines, the Manchester airport has be=
come
popular with Vermont travelers.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Commercial service also is provided by the Knapp Airport in Berlin. =
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<b style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:no=
rmal'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;layout-grid-mode:l=
ine'><br
clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span></i></b>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:14=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>6.7
<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Transportation Go=
als,
Policies &amp; Tasks<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:=
Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Goal</span></i></b><b style=3D'mso-=
bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Ro=
man"'><span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div style=3D'mso-element:para-border-div;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify;border:none;mso-border-a=
lt:solid windowtext .5pt;
padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-f=
ont-style:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-fo=
nt-weight:
bold'>The maintenance and enhancement of an efficient, cost effective, and
multi-modal transportation network to serve the needs of Northfield residen=
ts,
visitors, and businesses<o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

</div>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:=
Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Policies</span></i></b><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-=
bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The Town a=
nd
Village road systems should continue to be maintained in a manner that
maintains safe and efficient traffic conditions for current and future dema=
nd. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Major road
improvements and associated capital improvements will continue to be schedu=
led
through the municipal capital budgeting program, and securing alternative
funding sources to finance transportation projects will remain a priority of
the town.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>3)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>New roads,
including private roads serving new development, shall be constructed to th=
e <i
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vermont State Standards for the Design=
 of
Transportation Construction, Reconstruction and Rehabilitation of Freeways,
Roads &amp; Streets</i>.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Construction to such standards, however, does not obligate the Town =
or
Village to take over new roads.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Decisions on the acceptance of new roads shall be at the discretion =
of
the Village Trustees or Town Selectmen.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nb=
sp;
</span>Private roads will only be accepted if it is clearly in the public
interest and will not place an undue burden on local taxpayers.<o:p></o:p><=
/span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>4)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Northfield=
&#8217;s
five covered bridges not only serve an important transportation function
&#8211; they contribute to the community&#8217;s heritage and unique
character.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>These bridges shou=
ld be
maintained to continue serving their historic function. <o:p></o:p></span><=
/p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>5)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>To ensure
pedestrian safety and the long-term efficiency of the local road network,
access to state and local roads should be carefully controlled and existing
deficiencies (e.g., excessive or oversized curb-cuts) eliminated.<o:p></o:p=
></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>6)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>New
development shall not result in adverse impacts to traffic or pedestrian sa=
fety
of a significant decline in the level of service of the impacted road
network.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The cost of mitigati=
on to
avoid such impacts will be the responsibility of the developer.<o:p></o:p><=
/span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=

-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=

</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Northfield=
&#8217;s
transportation needs should be considered when decisions regarding the regi=
onal
and statewide transportation network are discussed and made.<o:p></o:p></sp=
an></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=

-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=

</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Road
improvements and development projects in Northfield Falls, Northfield Villa=
ge,
and Northfield Center should maximize pedestrian safety through site design=
 and
traffic calming.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=

-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=

style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>9)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=

</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Safety
improvements to Route 12 north of Northfield Village should be implemented,=
 to
include ledge removal, road widening, and the installation of
pedestrian/bicycle lanes.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=

</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Lovers Lan=
e,
which is subject to deterioration due to through traffic accessing I-89 to =
and
from Route 12A south of Northfield, should be upgraded and maintained with =
the
assistance of the Vermont Agency of Transportation.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=

-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=

Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>11)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times =
New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The contin=
ued
operation of a local and regional transit system at a minimum level of serv=
ice
as was provided by Central Vermont Wheels<sup>&reg;</sup> in 2001/2002 is
critical to the economic and social well-being of Northfield and should be
ensured.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>12)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times =
New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Vanpooling=
 and
car-pooling opportunities for local commuters are encouraged, and should be
supported through the provision of new or expanded state park &amp; ride
facilities at Exit 5 and in the Village.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoFooter style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:.5in center 3.0i=
n right 6.0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>13)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times =
New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The provis=
ion
of an integrated and well maintained pedestrian and bicycle path network in=
 and
around the Village is a key feature of the local transportation network.<sp=
an
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This system should be expanded thr=
ough
path connections from Memorial Park north to Bean Park and Northfield Falls=
 and
south along the Dog River to Norwich University.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>14)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times =
New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Parking in
residential neighborhoods shall be controlled to prevent nuisances to resid=
ents
of those neighborhoods stemming from excessive on-street parking.<o:p></o:p=
></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=
dent:
-27.0pt;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo25;tab-stops:list 27.0pt'><![if !supportLists=
]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>15)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times =
New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>New
development should provide adequate off-street parking to accommodate
employees, residents and/or patrons, unless the development is located in an
area where alternative parking exists (e.g., off-site parking lot, on-street
parking).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:27.0pt;text-align:justify;text-in=

<p class=3DMsoTitle><span style=3D'font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0=
pt;
text-transform:uppercase'>Chapter 7.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Community Facilities &amp; Services<i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:n=
ormal'><o:p></o:p></i></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><b><i><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>7.1<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Overview<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The Town and Village of Northfield provide or support a =
full
range of municipal services to local residents and businesses.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Each facility or service addresses=
 a particular
public need, which is partly determined by demographic and economic
conditions.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Depending on the =
type
of facility and its capacity, changes in the composition or size of the loc=
al
population, or the local economic climate, can affect the ability of the
municipality, or service providers, to meet local needs. <o:p></o:p></span>=
</p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText2 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-si=
ze:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>This chapter briefly describes existing faciliti=
es
and services and their respective capacities.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>It also describes associated costs=
 and
factors underlying municipal or public financing.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Consideration of the capacity of
existing facilities and services in relation to associated costs provides t=
he
foundation for shaping growth so that desired levels of service are maintai=
ned
or enhanced without placing an undue financial burden on taxpayers.<o:p></o=
:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><b><i><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>7.2 <span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <=
/span>Municipal
Government<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Northfield consists of two municipal entities &#8211;
Northfield Town, which encompasses all land within the municipal boundaries;
and Northfield Village, incorporated in 1855, which is located in the cente=
r of
the town.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Village residents v=
ote in
both the town and village, and village landowners pay property taxes to both
entities.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Northfield&#8217;s =
other
historic villages were never incorporated as separate municipalities.<o:p><=
/o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText2 style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in =
0in .25in .5in .75in 1.0in 1.25in 1.5in 1.75in 2.0in 2.25in 2.5in 2.75in 3.=
0in 3.25in 3.5in 3.75in 4.0in 4.25in 4.5in 4.75in 5.0in 5.25in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>The town and village h=
ave
achieved a high degree of cooperation over the years, and presently share m=
any
services and facilities.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The =
town
is governed by an elected five-member Board of Selectmen, while the village=
 is
governed by an elected five-member Board of Trustees.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Both entities have a municipal man=
ager
form of administration and have opted to share a single Town/Village Manager
for several years. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The town is responsible for emergency services (see belo=
w),
recreation, planning and zoning, maintenance of property records and, under
contract with the village, highway maintenance.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The village operates the water and=
 sewer
facilities and electric utility (see Chapter 9).<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Most services that are open to the
public, including the manager, town clerk, zoning administrator, public wor=
ks
supervisor and utility office are located in the municipal building on Main
Street.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The municipal buildin=
g is
owned by the village and is partly supported by rent paid by the town.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Other services and facilities are
located in and around the village (see Facilities Map). <o:p></o:p></span><=
/p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;mso-pagination:widow-orpha=
n'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText2 style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'=
><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Like most Vermont
communities, Northfield is heavily reliant on citizen volunteers for many
important government functions.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </sp=
an>In
addition to the two governing bodies, the following town and village elected
positions include:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText2 style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-1.0in -.5in'=
><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></spa=
n></p>
