  <v:imagedata src=3D"TownPlan_files/image036.wmz" o:title=3D""/>
  <w:wrap type=3D"topAndBottom" side=3D"largest" anchorx=3D"margin"/>
 </v:shape><![if gte mso 9]><o:OLEObject Type=3D"Embed" ProgID=3D"Excel.She=
et.8"
  ShapeID=3D"_x0000_s2071" DrawAspect=3D"Content" ObjectID=3D"_1197873297">
 </o:OLEObject>
 <![endif]><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style=3D'mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=3D0 cellspacing=3D0 align=3Dleft>
  <tr>
   <td width=3D46 height=3D0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=3D499 height=3D269 src=3D"TownPlan_files/image037.gif" v:=
shapes=3D"_x0000_s2071"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style=3D'mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=3DALL>
<span style=3D'font-size:8.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:8.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bi=
di-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>From a facility standpoint, the declining enrollment is =
good
news in that additional space will not be needed in the foreseeable
future.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>From a program and
financing standpoint, however, a declining enrollment places additional bur=
dens
on the school to maintain a full range of programs with fewer students.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This is especially true under the
present method of funding education that is based upon enrollment and the
per-pupil cost of education.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>=
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Development trends in the community and surrounding regi=
on,
and municipal economic and community development policies and programs, can
influence future enrollment trends by encouraging job creation and resident=
ial
development in the community.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span=
>Recent
initiatives, such as the Center for Cyber Terrorism (see Chapter 5), indica=
te
that some additional growth should be anticipated.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Not only should local schools be a=
ble to
accommodate anticipated growth in the near term without experiencing substa=
ntial
burden, such growth may be beneficial to the school by helping to maintain a
consistent student body while enhancing community vitality. <o:p></o:p></sp=
an></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>8.4 <span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <=
/span>Cost
of Education<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Funding local education is the
largest single expenditure for most Vermont municipalities, typically
accounting for between 65% to 90% of all local tax dollars. With the passag=
e of
Act 60 in 1997 (first implemented in FY99) the state instituted a statewide
property tax to fund education, and an &#8220;income sensitization&#8221;
feature that limits the amount of education property tax to be paid by
income-qualified Vermont residents.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&=
nbsp;
</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:w=
rapblock><v:shape
  id=3D"_x0000_s2072" type=3D"#_x0000_t75" style=3D'position:absolute;left:=
0;
  text-align:left;margin-left:114.2pt;margin-top:0;width:358.85pt;height:16=
8.9pt;
  z-index:23;mso-wrap-distance-top:7.2pt;mso-wrap-distance-bottom:7.2pt;
  mso-position-horizontal-relative:page;mso-position-vertical-relative:page'
  stroked=3D"t" strokeweight=3D"1.25pt">
  <v:imagedata src=3D"TownPlan_files/image038.wmz" o:title=3D""/>
  <w:wrap type=3D"topAndBottom" side=3D"largest" anchorx=3D"page" anchory=
=3D"page"/>
  <w:anchorlock/>
 </v:shape><![if gte mso 9]><o:OLEObject Type=3D"Embed" ProgID=3D"Excel.She=
et.8"
  ShapeID=3D"_x0000_s2072" DrawAspect=3D"Content" ObjectID=3D"_1197873298">
 </o:OLEObject>
 <![endif]><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style=3D'mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=3D0 cellspacing=3D0 align=3Dleft>
  <tr>
   <td width=3D150 height=3D0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=3D483 height=3D229 src=3D"TownPlan_files/image039.gif" v:=
shapes=3D"_x0000_s2072"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style=3D'mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=3DALL>
<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-wei=
ght:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The statewide property tax is
calculated for each community using an &#8220;Equalized Education Property =
Tax
Grand List,&#8221; as determined by the state based on estimates of the fair
market value of all listed real property in the community.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This is used to measure the proper=
ty
wealth of a school district.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Currently (2002/2003), the equalized statewide education tax rate is=
 $1.10;
every student receives a general state support grant of $5,651.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>For districts spending above the g=
rant,
a local share tax is imposed in addition to the statewide tax, as in the ca=
se
of Northfield.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The local shar=
e tax
is determined directly from per pupil spending above the block grant.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>As a result, Northfield&#8217;s
effective tax rate for education &#8211; $1.61 in 2003 &#8211; is lower than
the state average ($1.68) for the same year.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Despite Northfield having a per-pupil cost above the sta=
te
block grant ($7,462 in 2002/03), it is still below the state average ($7,72=
5)
and Northfield remains a &#8220;receiving&#8221; town under Act 60, meaning
that the town receives more in state property tax revenue than is raised
locally.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This is partly due to
lower than average budget increases since Act 60 was put into effect.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>When funds are adjusted for inflat=
ion,
the average annual budget increase over the past five years has been
approximately 1.5%. Total annual expenditures for 1998/99 through 2002/03 a=
re
presented in Figure 8.2 <b style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></i></b></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-right:.5in;text-align:justify;tab-stop=
s:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>8.5<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Northfield
Schools &amp; the Community<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The Northfield Community School Organization (CSO) was
formed in 1988 with a mission of &#8220;build(ing) bridges between the
Northfield School and parents of Northfield students and the greater Northf=
ield
population, with an organizational focus on PK through 8<sup>th</sup>
grade.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Composed of volunteer
parents, teachers, school administrators and community members, the CSO
sponsors several activities, including an after-school program offering
enrichment programs between January and March, an Artist in Residence progr=
am,
family activities, and fundraising to supplement school budgets and expand
curriculum.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span=
></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Among the most important issues raised at the Vermont
Council for Rural Development&#8217;s community visit in January 2002, was =
the
need to promote academic excellence in the Northfield School system.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>As part of that process, a group of
local residents focused on the local school system&#8217;s strengths and
challenges.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Summaries of the =
three
key challenges identified are:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:0in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:1.0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l25 level1 =
lfo45;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial'>=
<span
style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&n=
bsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp=
;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Deficits in
terms of academic atmosphere, curricular opportunities, and performance.<o:=
p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom=
:3.0pt;
margin-left:1.0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l25 level1 =
lfo45;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial'>=
<span
style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&n=
bsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp=
;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>A lack of
field space for playground and sports.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:1.0in;text-align:justify;text-ind=
ent:
-.5in;mso-list:l25 level1 lfo45;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><=
span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>3)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>A lack of
sustained parental involvement and leadership toward academic, rather than
athletic, excellence, especially for higher grades and high school.<o:p></o=
:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>With the exception of facility
concerns (e.g., ballfields), which are mentioned above, issues associated w=
ith
curriculum and academic programs are generally outside of the scope of this
plan.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>8.6<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span>Adult
Education<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:-.5in'><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Adult education opportunities=
 for
Northfield residents are available locally through Norwich University and at
various regional centers.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Regional
Adult Education. </span><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:=
12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The Community College of Vermont (CCV)&#8217;s
Montpelier campus provides a variety of courses and degree programs.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In addition the Vermont Technical
College in Randolph and the University of Vermont and several other college=
s in
the Burlington area provide higher learning opportunities for local residen=
ts.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>A growing number of opportunities =
for
&#8220;distance learning&#8221; are available on-line and through the Vermo=
nt
Interactive Television (ITV) site in Waterbury.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>A variety of</span><span style=3D'font-size:11.0=
pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>
adult basic educational programs are also available through Central Vermont
Adult Basic Education, with offices in Barre, Montpelier, and Randolph.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>These include individualized and g=
roup
educational services to adults in their homes, at the learning center, and =
in
community settings.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Basic edu=
cation
programs serve those who wish to improve their reading, writing, and math
skills for use on the job or in daily life, those who are studying for their
high school equivalency degree (GED) or adult diploma, and those who want to
learn English as a second language.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Computer training is also available.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Central Vermont Adult Basic
Education also offers a family literacy program, an out of school youth
program, a teen parenting education program, and a getting ready to work
program for welfare recipients who are seeking academic and job skills to
improve their occupational outlook.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h5 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-f=
ont-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Norwich
University.</span><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal=
'><span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span></span><span style=3D'font-size:11=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman";
font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Norwich
University is the nation&#8217;s oldest military college whose student body=
 is
composed of the Corps of Cadets and civilians with the majority belonging to
the Corps of Cadets.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The ROTC
program at the University is represented by all branches of the armed
services.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Norwich offers stat=
e of
the art science, engineering, communications, nursing, architecture, sports
medicine, humanities, criminal justice and liberal arts degree programs,
including several post graduate degrees.<o:p></o:p></span></h5>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:0in'><b><i><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>8.7<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=
sp; </span></span></i></b><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Education Goals, Policies &amp; Tasks<o:p></o:p></span><=
/i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:0in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nb=
sp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify;tab-stops:0in'><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:norma=
l'><span
style=3D'font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Goal<o:p=
></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-famil=
y:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div style=3D'mso-element:para-border-div;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'>

<p class=3DMsoBodyText3 style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-si=
ze:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>The
availability of high quality educational facilities and programs to enable =
all
Northfield residents, especially children and youth, to become competent,
productive, and responsible citizens.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoHeading7 style=3D'text-align:justify'><i>Policies<o:p></o:p><=
/i></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l46 level1 lfo46;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Continue to
provide sufficient and appropriate K-12 school facilities to meet current a=
nd
anticipated enrollments.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p=
></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l46 level1 lfo46;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Support
programs and efforts to strengthen the central role that Northfield&#8217;s
schools play in the community.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l46 level1 lfo46;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>3)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Continue to
support and possibly expand the interaction between the Northfield High Sch=
ool
system and Norwich University.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l46 level1 lfo46;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>4)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Support
efforts to reduce the reliance on the local property tax for funding educat=
ion
and ensure that Northfield students have access to educational facilities a=
nd
programs equal to students in other Vermont communities. <o:p></o:p></span>=
</p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l46 level1 lfo46;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>5)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Encourage =
the
greater participation of Northfield residents in available adult education
programs.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b><i><span style=3D'font=
-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Tasks<o:p></o:p></span></i></=
b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l32 level1 lfo47;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Explore
options for expanding recreational facilities in or adjacent to local schoo=
ls.
[School Board]<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-inde=
nt:-.5in;
mso-list:l32 level1 lfo47;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-f=
areast-font-family:
Arial'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times N=
ew Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=
p;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-fon=
t-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Continue to
monitor enrollment and population trends, and to make regular enrollment
projections to ensure that the school system is prepared for significant
changes in enrollment trends.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>[School Board, Planning Commission]<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
font-variant:small-caps;text-transform:uppercase;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;layout-grid-mode:line'><=

clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoTitle><span style=3D'font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0=
pt;
text-transform:uppercase'>Chapter 9.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Energy<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b><=
/p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:14=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>9.1
<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Overview<o:p></o:=
p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Reliable,
affordable, and sustainable sources of energy are vital to Northfield&#8217=
;s
economy, social well-being, and future development.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Every individual, home, office and
business in town relies on some sort of fuel or energy for transportation,
heating, lighting, and the operation of equipment and appliances.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>International events and rising fu=
el
prices are reminders, however, that too heavy a reliance on any one source =
of
energy can leave the nation, and local residents and businesses, vulnerable=
 to
market changes and shortages.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span=
>It is
also increasingly well documented that our current patterns of energy
consumption are contributing to global warming and climatic change which, if
they remain unchecked, will dramatically affect Vermont&#8217;s climate over
the next several decades.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Factors
influencing the cost and availability of energy, at present, are largely be=
yond
the control of the local community.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Changing technologies, and evolving national and state energy polici=
es
&#8211; including utility deregulation, demand side management, infrastruct=
ure
investment, and the promotion of more efficient and renewable
&#8220;green&#8221; energy sources &#8211; all have an affect on local ener=
gy
supplies.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>There are several t=
hings
Northfield, and its residents and businesses can do to influence our energy
outlook, particularly to promote energy conservation and efficiency, and to
encourage the development and use of alternative energy sources and
technologies. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:14=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>9.2
<span style=3D'mso-tab-count:1'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Demand<o:p></o:p>=
</span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11=
.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><u><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-f=
amily:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Statewide Trends<o:p></o:p></=
span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><u><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-f=
amily:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p><span style=3D'text-deco=
ration:
 none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Information
included in <i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Fueling Vermont&#8217;s
Future, </i>the state&#8217;s 1998, 20-year comprehensive energy plan,
indicates that overall energy demand continues to escalate statewide.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This is due largely to a dramatic =
growth
in fuel consumption for transportation, resulting from increases in both the
number of vehicles on the road and total vehicle miles traveled.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>During the economic boom of the 19=
90s
commercial and industrial energy demand also grew significantly.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Residential use also increased, bu=
t at a
much slower rate.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This is
attributed to more energy efficient residential construction in recent year=
s,
and the wider use of energy efficient appliances.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Transportation
currently accounts for around 43% of Vermont&#8217;s total energy use, and
space heating another 28%.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Wa=
ter
heating (9%), process heat for industrial purposes (8%), and other
miscellaneous uses (lighting, air conditioning, appliances, etc.), are
responsible for the rest of the demand.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nb=
sp;
</span>Energy use varies by sector, as noted in Table 9,1.<o:p></o:p></span=
></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=3Dcenter>

<table class=3DMsoNormalTable border=3D1 cellspacing=3D0 cellpadding=3D0

ext .5pt;

h:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style=3D'mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>

olid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;background:black;padding:0in 5.4pt 0=
in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=3DMsoNormal align=3Dcenter style=3D'text-align:center'><b
  style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso=
-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:whi=
te'>Table
  9.1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=3DMsoNormal align=3Dcenter style=3D'text-align:center'><b
  style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso=
-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:whi=
te'>Principal
  Energy Use by Sector in Vermont<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style=3D'mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width=3D112 valign=3Dtop style=3D'width:84.15pt;border:solid windowte=
xt 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:s=
olid windowtext .5pt;

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Demand
also varies by energy source.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;
</span>Petroleum is by far the most predominant fuel used in Vermont, and w=
ill
continue to be in demand well into the future, despite growing uncertaintie=
s regarding
long-term oil supplies and associated costs.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Total electrical energy use has al=
so
risen steadily, despite efficiency gains.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&=
nbsp;
</span>Propane (LPG) use is also increasing while wood, used mainly for home
heating, has fluctuated over the years in relation to the price of heating
fuel.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Total
energy demand statewide is expected to increase 54% between 1990 (base year)
and 2015.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This increase will
continue to stem largely from growth in the transportation sector, due to
increases in the number of vehicles, miles traveled, declining fuel
efficiencies, and dispersed patterns of development.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:sha=
pe id=3D"_x0000_s2073"
 type=3D"#_x0000_t202" style=3D'position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;

21650 -58 -50 -58"
 stroked=3D"f">
 <v:textbox>
  <![if !mso]>
  <table cellpadding=3D0 cellspacing=3D0 width=3D"100%">
   <tr>
    <td><![endif]>
    <div>
    <div style=3D'mso-element:para-border-div;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
    mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal align=3Dcenter style=3D'text-align:center;border:n=
one;
    mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt =
4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><b
    style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;
    font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Global Warmin=
g in
    <st1:place w:st=3D"on"><st1:State w:st=3D"on">Vermont</st1:State></st1:=
place><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowte=
xt .5pt;
    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times=
 New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowte=
xt .5pt;
    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times=
 New Roman"'>According
    to the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, temperatures in <st1:=
place
    w:st=3D"on"><st1:State w:st=3D"on">Vermont</st1:State></st1:place> could
    increase by 6 degrees over the next few decades.<span
    style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This increase would make <st1:=
State
    w:st=3D"on">Vermont</st1:State>&#8217;s climate more like that of <st1:=
place
    w:st=3D"on"><st1:State w:st=3D"on">New Jersey</st1:State></st1:place>. =
<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowte=
xt .5pt;
    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times=
 New Roman"'>The
    result:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowte=
xt .5pt;
    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times=
 New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=
list:
    l42 level1 lfo48;tab-stops:list .25in;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid =

    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><![if !supportList=
s]><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Sy=

    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=
ily:
    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>More volatile and variable
    weather conditions<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=

    l42 level1 lfo48;tab-stops:list .25in;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid =

    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=

    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Hotter summers, shorter f=

    foliage and ski seasons<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=

    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=

    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>An increase in storm even=

    and stormwater runoff<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=

    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>More frequent dry spells =

    water shortages<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=

    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=
ily:
    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Loss of hardwood forests,
    including the sugar maple<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=

    l42 level1 lfo48;tab-stops:list .25in;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid =

    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><![if !supportList=

    mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot;<s=
pan
    style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&n=
bsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=
ily:
    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Greater need for agricult=
ural
    irrigation<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=
list:
    l42 level1 lfo48;tab-stops:list .25in;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid =
windowtext .5pt;
    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><![if !supportList=
s]><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Sy=
mbol;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style=3D'mso-list:Ignore'>&middot;<s=
pan
    style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&n=
bsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=
ily:
    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Loss of migratory bird,
    endangered species populations<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-=

    l42 level1 lfo48;tab-stops:list .25in;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid =

    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><![if !supportList=

pan
    style=3D'font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&n=
bsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
    </span></span></span><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-fam=
ily:
    Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Introduction of warmer
    climate species and pests.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowte=
xt .5pt;
    padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt'><span
    style=3D'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times=
 New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
    <p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-indent:.25in;border:none;mso-border-=
alt:
    solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0=
pt'><span
    style=3D'font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
    mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Source:<span
    style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><i style=3D'mso-bidi-font-styl=
e:normal'>Climate
    Change and <st1:State w:st=3D"on">Vermont</st1:State></i>, <st1:place w=
:st=3D"on"><st1:country-region
     w:st=3D"on">U.S.</st1:country-region></st1:place> EPA, 1998.<o:p></o:p=
></span></p>
    </div>
    </div>
    <![if !mso]></td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <![endif]></v:textbox>
 <w:wrap type=3D"square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=3D378 height=3D304
src=3D"TownPlan_files/image040.gif" align=3Dleft hspace=3D12
alt=3D"Text Box: Global Warming in Vermont&#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;According to =
the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, temperatures in Vermont coul=
d increase by 6 degrees over the next few decades.  This increase would mak=
e Vermont&#8217;s climate more like that of New Jersey. &#13;&#10;The resul=
t:&#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;&#8226;	More volatile and variable weather conditions=
&#13;&#10;&#8226;	Hotter summers, shorter fall foliage and ski seasons&#13;=
&#10;&#8226;	An increase in storm events and stormwater runoff&#13;&#10;&#8=
226;	More frequent dry spells and water shortages&#13;&#10;&#8226;	Loss of =
hardwood forests, including the sugar maple&#13;&#10;&#8226;	Greater need f=
or agricultural irrigation&#13;&#10;&#8226;	Loss of migratory bird, endange=
red species populations&#13;&#10;&#8226;	Introduction of warmer climate spe=
cies and pests.&#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;Source:  Climate Change and Vermont, U.S=
. EPA, 1998.&#13;&#10;"
v:shapes=3D"_x0000_s2073"><![endif]><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bid=
i-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The associ=
ated
impacts of increased energy use are increasingly well documented.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Motor vehicles fueled by petroleum
sources are the state&#8217;s largest source of toxic and carcinogenic air
pollutants &#8211; the average vehicle emits around a half a ton of air
pollution each year.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Vehicle
emissions pose a health threat locally (even at low levels), contribute to =
acid
rain, and can cause widespread damage to crops and forests.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>&#8220;Green house gases&#8221; su=
ch as
carbon dioxide, emitted from motor vehicles and oil-fired furnaces also
contribute to climatic warming.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Future
energy expenditures are also expected to increase accordingly (1.7% per year
through 2015), due to increased consumption levels and rising energy
prices.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:sha=
pe id=3D"_x0000_s2074"
 type=3D"#_x0000_t75" style=3D'position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;
 margin-left:0;margin-top:4.25pt;width:243.1pt;height:198pt;z-index:-2;
 mso-wrap-edited:f;mso-position-horizontal:left' wrapcoords=3D"-267 -164 -2=
67 21682 21800 21682 21800 -164 -267 -164"
 o:allowincell=3D"f" stroked=3D"t" strokeweight=3D"1.25pt">
 <v:imagedata src=3D"TownPlan_files/image041.emz" o:title=3D""/>
 <w:wrap type=3D"square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=3D328 height=3D268
src=3D"TownPlan_files/image042.gif" align=3Dleft hspace=3D12 v:shapes=3D"_x=
0000_s2074"><![endif]><b
style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style=3D'font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Local Demand<o:p></o:p></span></u><=
/b></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>There
is much less information available regarding local energy use &#8211;
particularly commercial and industrial use&#8211; but given available data,
local use generally reflects state and national consumption patterns. <o:p>=
</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Municipal Energy Expenditures=
</span></b><span
style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-b=
idi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>According
to annual report information, the Town and Village of Northfield spent over
$200,000 on energy in 2000, for electricity, gas and diesel fuel, and heati=
ng
fuel.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The village accounted f=
or 64%
of total expenditures, including 83% of the amount spent on electricity.<sp=
an
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New R=
oman";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
layout-grid-mode:line'><br clear=3Dall style=3D'page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>The
high demand for electricity in the village is largely the result of water a=
nd
sewer system operation &#8211; accounting for 45% of total municipal
electricity costs.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>This is in
keeping with energy consumption associated with industrial equipment and
processes.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Street lighting
accounted for another 41% of electricity expenditures.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>In 2000, the combined cost of
electricity for water and sewer system operation and street lighting ($120,=
695)
represented 60% of total municipal energy expenditures.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Transportation fuel costs accounte=
d for
26% of the municipal total &#8211; including 63% of the town&#8217;s energy
expense.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Transportation.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span></span></b><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>According
to Vermont Agency of Transportation data, vehicle miles traveled annually on
state routes through Northfield increased by nearly 3,300 miles (8%) between
1990 and 2000 &#8211; much less than the 15% increase in vehicle miles trav=
eled
countywide.<b style=3D'mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </b>Nevertheless, rece=
nt
U.S. Census data suggest that Northfield residents are more auto-dependent =
than
ever (Table 9.2).<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p>=
</span></p>

</div>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>The
number of cars per household has grown, and 68% of Northfield&#8217;s
population continues to drive to work alone.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>Total commute time increased by 37=
% over
the last decade.<span style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span>The number of
employed working at home, walking, and carpooling also increased, but conti=
nued
to represent around 30% of the town&#8217;s working population.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Of those walking or working =
at
home in 2000, 86% lived in Northfield Village.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b><=
/p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><b style=3D'mso-bidi-font=
-weight:
normal'><span style=3D'font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-fami=
ly:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Home Heating.<span
style=3D'mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp; </span></span></b><span style=3D'font-siz=
e:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'>Home
heating methods used by Northfield households are also reported in the U.S.
Census (Table 9.3).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=3DMsoNormal style=3D'text-align:justify'><span style=3D'font-size:=
11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New=
 Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
